00011 void writeMapFile(MavenCompiler* c) {
00012         // we have to write the map of the map
00013         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00014                 c->mapFileHandle << "namespace " << c->namespaces->at(i).name << " {\n";
00015                 for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->length(); ++j)
00016                         //if((namespaces->at(i).objects[j]->variables.length() - countStaticVariables(i, j)) + countClassMethods(i, j) > 0)
00017                                 c->mapFileHandle << "  class " << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->name << ";\n";
00018                 c->mapFileHandle << "}\n";
00019         }
00020         
00021         // objects
00022         for(int i = 0; i < c->discovery.size(); ++i) {
00023                 c->mapFileHandle << "namespace " << c->namespaces->at(c->discovery[i].namespaceID).name << " {" << endl;
00024                 writeMapObject(c, c->discovery[i].namespaceID, c->discovery[i].objectID);
00025                 c->mapFileHandle << "}\n";
00026         }
00027         
00028         // prepare class from compilation
00029         free(c->imports);
00030         c->imports = new StringList();
00031         c->lineNumber = 0;
00032         c->errors.clear();
00033 }
